pullRequest.title: Implement MSLE (MeanSquaredLogarithmicError) evaluation metric for regression analysis
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR implements MSLE evaluation metric for regression analysis.
Additionally, this PR adds RegressionEvaluationIT integration tests class.
Closes #58682

nodes.bodyText: The field name "error" is confusing could this be "msle"
?? I would expect this to be set in the test setup but I don't see that
Actually I see MeanSquaredError also has a field "error" and in the context of the result object it makes sense
